title: Amazing Opportunity to "Change the Game" for Women in Sports
content:
GameChangers is an online competition powered through Ashoka’s Changemakers and Nike whose goal is to discover innovative projects aimed at “changing the game” for women across the globe.

We are looking to beat the odds, level the playing field and improve the lives of women through the power of sport and fitness. Our competitors will form a community where they will interact with each other, a judging panel, and the wider Changemakers network to expand their knowledge and improve their game. It’s a competition and a community in one aimed at creating opportunities for women to win.

Visit [http://sportforchange.changemakers.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821085143/http:/sportforchange.changemakers.net/ "http://sportforchange.changemakers.net/")
author: Changemakers
